title: Christmas Games Sound Effects And Music Pack
description: Ho ho ho, It’s Christmas time! The most wonderful time of the year. Get into the holiday spirit with our festive Christmas-themed royalty free sound pack!
longDescription:
Deck the Halls with joyful jingles, whimsical melodies and cozy carols to set the perfect holiday mood. Christmas Games Music & SFX Pack adds the warm charm of Christmas to holiday themed casual games, puzzles, match and word games. Whether you’re building a candy cane match-3 or a snowy Christmas word puzzle, this pack has the sounds to make your game a holiday hit! Jingle all the way with high quality royalty-free Christmas music tracks and festive sound effects that bring the joy of Santa and conjure the spirit of Christmas.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 5 x Loopable Music Track

⦿ 2 x Stingers 

⦿ 133+ Sound Effects


Christmas Games Sound and Music Pack is mostly used in Christmas Puzzle, Christmas Match, Idle, Hybrid-casual, Hyper-casual, Casual games.


This sound effects and music pack includes; 

⦿ Music tracks

⦿ Stingers

⦿ Chimes

⦿ Footsteps

⦿ Giftbox

⦿ Paper

⦿ Sleigh bells

⦿ Swoosh

⦿ Toys

⦿ UI

⦿ Voice-overs

⦿ Pole ambiences and many more.


Keywords: royalty-free SFX, sound effects, music, game audio, christmas, christmas games, christmas games sound effects, jingle bells, santa, santa claus, holiday, winter, christmas music
